DialogueData.Text: A voice on the PA announces the start of class in five minutes. Look for your classroom in the northwest corner.

DialogueData.Speaker: Student
DialogueData.Text: They say aliens have been attacking students here lately.

DialogueData.Speaker: Jaime
DialogueData.Text: (Several flyers have been posted here by the administration...)
Remember that aliens aren't real and cannot hurt you! If you see an alien, stay calm and continue your current task.
Under no cirumstances are students allowed use arcane technomagics to battle aliens. Which aren't real.

DialogueData.Speaker: Jaime
DialogueData.Text: (... But everyone knows aliens are real now. That's why I had to learn arcane technomagic.)
It's almost time for class to begin. Look for your classroom in the northwest corner marked on your minimap with a star.
